ip1:

var X
mov R1 $10
mov R2 $100
mul R3 R1 R2
st R3 X
hlt

op1:

1001000100001010
1001001001100100
1011000011001010
1010101100000101
0101000000000000

ip2:

var X
mov R1 $10
mov R2 $100
add R3 R1 R2
st R3 X
hlt

op2:

1001000100001010
1001001001100100
1011000011001010
1000000011001010
1010101100000101
0101000000000000

ip3:

var X
mov R1 $10
mov R2 $100
sub R3 R1 R2
st R3 X
hlt

op3:

1001000100001010
1001001001100100
1011000011001010
1000100011001010
1010101100000101
0101000000000000

ip4:

var X
mov R1 $10
mov R2 $100
div R3 R1 R2
st R3 X
hlt

op4:

1001000100001010
1001001001100100
1011000011001010
1011100011001010
1010101100000101
0101000000000000

ip5:

var X
mov R1 $10
mov R2 $100
div R3 R1 R2
st R3 X
hlt
